name: wav ocs game
description:
Hi there, I'm 24 years odl with Cerebral Palsy and Other Learning Difficulties. This is my first attempt at a game - try it out - its just a bit of fun for me to do during lockdown!

The inention of this game is to complete a time-trial challenge where you try to improve your time without dropping of the edge. The blocks represent obstacles a wheelchair user like me has to get around. I got this idea from going to airports on my various travels. If you like it do play again and again to improve your time.

Thank you very much........
